title: Morgan Stanley Raises $8 Billion From US Dollar Bond Sale
description: Morgan Stanley sold $8 billion of bonds as Wall Street banks flooded the debt markets after earnings.
content: Morgan Stanley sold $8 billion of bonds as Wall Street banks flooded the debt markets after earnings.
